paragraphs.name: 747b
paragraphs.text: Nice Sir, and thank you for your thorough post! I feel like long passages or technical info should follow the “Crystal Goblet” philosophy with variance for medium as well as some wiggle room for style or brand. That said, I always like contrasting sedate legibility with some solid flavor brand presence in headlines or subs. Thinking about the users…

paragraphs.name: 19fd
paragraphs.text: Batpucky.

paragraphs.name: f296
paragraphs.text: Good typography can make a difference, and bad type can make a site almost unusable, but there is a vast ground of ‘good enough’ in between. You can make an acceptable website with just Times in roman, italic and bold variants.
